reviews.title: Love itttt
reviews.comment: This game is wicked addicting .. I love the sound of the bubbles smashing and its actually challenging
reviews.author: Annika Rose

reviews.title: Ads on paid version
reviews.comment: Why do I get a page of adverts whenever I try to close this game? Not ad free at all. Uninstalled and refund requested.
reviews.author: A Google User
